name: Robot Wars Game
description:
Unique technology transfers on your screen what you are experiencing at next gen consoles.

The R.O.B.O.T. is the ultimate space 3rd person shooter, that takes you into the near future, where mankind dominated intergalactic travel. The year is 2112 at Omega station on the planet called Mars 2. On this planet, mankind experiments with new artificial intelligence for robots Centurion-Citizen series 2. The Earth already has no response with this base for a few weeks, so they sent you, Ultimate Intergalactic Seal(UIS), to find out what is happening. Your primary task is to make contact with the Omega base, and remove any possible threats at any cost. The game is the vanguard of upcomming CG animated movie, that will display a stunning story of a man and robotics. Breathtaking story reveals all secrets and mysteries which people are afraid since early ages. This film is going to be introduced in the second third of 2013. If you do not lose a bit of a stirring story, download the game and spend the first part of the journey of discovery.
